author: billbarker
msg: Try and fix once and for all the compatibility issue between Tomcat and Sun's totally broken RMI spec.

Since 5.5 is 1.4+ only, I've removed the now unneeded calls to JdkCompat.  I believe that I've caught all of the code-base problems (but not really tested :).  I'll port to 6.0 as soon as I know that there are no vetos outstanding.
